resources.string: "Which one of these is a modernist writer? A. Hemmingway C. Ovid B. G.G Marquez D. Stewart"
"Which best of these best describes post modern lit? A. Realist C. Structured B. Confusing D. None"
"Who wrote Of Mice and Men? A. Steinbeck C. Hemmingway B. Bradbury D. Frost"
"When was Beowulf written? A. 700-1000AD C. 1200-1500AD B. 300-600AD D. 0-300AD"
"Who wrote Hamlet? A. Shakespeare C. Babbage B. Williams D. Chaucer"
"What is iambic pentameter? A. stressed/unstressed C. stressed/stressed B. unstressed/stressed D. unstressed/unstressed"
